text: Erik van der Wurff (9 July 1945 - 22 September 2014) was a Dutch pianist, composer, arranger, producer and conductor. He worked on mostly the soundtracks and as a composer for many movies and television shows. He was mainly worked between 1977 and 2003. He also made acting appearances in two Dutch television shows in 1977 and 1980. ==Life== Van der Wurff was born in De Bilt, Utrecht. In 2009, he was given the Order of the Netherlands Lion. Van der Wurff died from cancer on 22 September 2014 in Soest, near Amersfoort, Utrecht, aged 69. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1945 births Category:2014 deaths Category:20th-century Dutch composers Category:21st- century Dutch composers Category:Cancer deaths in the Netherlands Category:Dutch conductors Category:Dutch pianists Category:Movie score composers Category:Musicians from Utrecht (province) Category:Dutch record producers
title: Erik van der Wurff
